original_text: The wings of the cherubs touched each other above the place where the Covenant Box was. The cherubs covered the Covenant Box and the poles that the Levites used to carry it.
korean_text: 그룹들이 궤 처소 위에서 날개를 펴서 궤와 그 채를 덮었는데

sentences.original_text: The wings of the cherubs touched each other
above the place where the Covenant Box was
The cherubs covered the Covenant Box
and the poles that the Levites used to carry it
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 레위 사람들이 그것을 운반하는 데 사용한 막대기들도
